name: Classic Inca Trail to Machu Picchu 4D/3N
description: The Classic Inca Trail is South America's most famous trekking route, combining Andean landscapes, cloud forest, and unique archaeological sites, culminating at Machu Picchu at sunrise on the fourth day.

itinerary.title: Cusco – Km 82 – Wayllabamba
itinerary.description: Early departure from Cusco to Km 82. Hike through agricultural landscapes and the archaeological site of Llactapata. Camp at Wayllabamba.

itinerary.title: Wayllabamba – Warmiwañusca – Pacaymayo
itinerary.description: Ascent to the highest point of the trail (Warmiwañusca Pass, 4,215 m). Descent and camp at Pacaymayo.

itinerary.title: Pacaymayo – Wiñay Wayna
itinerary.description: Visit Runkurakay, Sayacmarca, and Phuyupatamarca. Hike through cloud forest to Wiñay Wayna.

itinerary.title: Wiñay Wayna – Machu Picchu – Cusco
itinerary.description: Very early departure to Inti Punku (Sun Gate) to see the sunrise at Machu Picchu. Guided tour and return to Cusco.

includes: Entrance fees to Inca Trail and Machu Picchu
